titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
Jan. 1. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Vita d’Alfieri, p. 40. Uwins calls: sup at
Reynolds’s
.

2. M. Commonwealth, revise. Alfieri, p. 58. Call on B Montagu
&
Colburn
: N Gcalls: Hu[o?]ley sups.

3. Tu. Commonwealth, revise.
Museum;Parl. History . Card, Hodgets : calls, B Montagu & N G : M W S at tea.
4. W. Commonwealth, revise. Alfieri, p. 74.

5. Th.
Bradshaw . Proofs. Hazlit, 3 Whites,M W S & miss Collins dine; adv. W
. Alfieri, p. 92.

6. F. Commonwealth, revise. Call on R Taylor
n : theatre, Woolgathering.

7. Sa.
Gyde calls: seek Kenney : theatre, Bold Stroke, acts 4 & 5. Proofs.
Jan. 8. Su. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pages. Proofs. M W Scalls.Frost, 9 days.
9. M. Commonwealth, 1 page. Percy dines: M Jones calls.

10. Tu. Commonwealth, 1 page. Omegarus, Vol. I. Call on mrs Osborne
&
M W S
.

11. W. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Hume
: M W S dines; adv. Uwins
.
12. Th. Commonwealth, revise.Omegarus, Vol. II, p. 100.
13. F. Commonwealth, revise. Write to rev. Mark Noble . Omegarus, p. 204, fin.
14. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Colburn calls.
Jan. 15. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Alfieri, p. 100.

16. M. Commonwealth, revise. Hudson dines (1/2 Deliquium ); adv. W
.

217. Tu.
Museum; Baxter
.Write to Mark Noble . Ayres , Berry , Desborough & Evanson .
Pilcher dies.
18. W. Commonwealth, revise. Alfieri, p. 119.
19. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Museum, Henderson . M W S dines.

20. F. Commonwealth, revise.Call on Northcote
: N G calls.

21. Sa. Commonwealth, 1/2 page (fin. C. IX); revise. Alfieri, p. 149. Call on Booth
.
Jan. 22. Su. Commonwealth, revise. M W S calls: dine at Hume’s , w. mrs Browne & son,A Burnet & M Tollemash .

23. M. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Fellowes
n : au soir, L Hunt; adv. Hine & miss Kent
.
Last Man published .
24. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. W calls, from Bousfield : theatre, Duenna.

25. W. Commonwealth, revise. Write to M Noble . Call on M W S
: sup at Reynolds’s
.

26. Th. Commonwealth, revise. M W S & W dine; adv. Uwins
: au soir, La. C Lamb’s , w. La. Charlotte Bury, Berger, Bulwers, Goddard, miss Richardson, &c. mrs Parnther, Bishop .

27. F. Commonwealth, revise. Call on M W S
n : sup at Lamb’s , w. W .

28. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Isa Booth
: theatre, Malvina; adv. Barhams
.

Jan. 29. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Call on La C Lamb
n, adv. Lyon, or Bishop
. H P calls.

30. M. Commonwealth, revise. Call on M W S
n : Walker, S B, calls.
31. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. M W S calls.

Feb. 1. W. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Thos Campbel
n , &
La Ch Bury
: theatre, Girl of Erin; adv. W
.

2. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Seek J Taylor, Sun
: call on Knowles
: M W S & W dine: Walker, S B, calls n . Parliament meets.

3. F. Call on Mrs T Campbel
&
Hazlit
: British Gallery : A Harwood at tea.

4. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Fellowes calls: dine at M W S’s
.

Feb. 5. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Booth (adv. 2 Baxters ), &
Hodgets
nit. (
pere & fils
)

6. M. Commonwealth, revise.
Museum, Lilburne; adv. Bacon
: call on Colburn
. Last Man, fin.

7. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. M W S , W & Walker, S B, call: call on
M
n .
8. W. Commonwealth, revise. M & Kenney call: W Hopwood sups. Uwins calls: meet Fellowes .

9. Th. Commonwealth, revise. M W S dines: call, w. her, on L Hunt ; adv. mrs Williams
. Basia.
10. F. Museum; Quarter-master general Ireton . Alfieri, p. 222. M calls, twice. Cold.

11. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. M dines{;} adv. M W S
:
Hurst’s (Tooke’s Court) , w. him, W &H P : theatre, French Libertine.
Feb. 12. Su. Commonwealth, revise. H P & Walker, S B, call: M au soir.

13. M. Commonwealth, revise.
Hurst’s , w. W & Macgowan; Serjeants’ Inn, w. them, & H P
: M W S at tea.

14. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. Alfieri, p. 272. M calls: meet Kenney & Soane, junr
.
15. W. Commonwealth, revise. Meet Liston & J C Banks : N G & M call.

16. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Call on W, K B
: M W S dines; adv. White, Isleworth
. meet Barnham
.
17. F. Commonwealth, revise. Alfieri, Vol. II, p. 36.

18. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Brambletyre, p. 135. Call on La C Lamb
;
Nathan
&
Pattersons
,
femmes
: meet Hill : call on Reynolds
n .
Feb. 19. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Brambletye, p. 335. Hodgets calls n .

20. M. Commonwealth, revise. Museum, Nov. 15 . Brambletye, p. 378; Vol. II, p. 76.
M W S
& Lbs call.
21. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. Brambletye, p. 202. M au soir.

22. W. Commonwealth, revise. Brambletye, p. 320. White & Dr Burney call: sup at Knowles’s
.
23. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Brambletye, p. 399; Vol. III, p. 102. M calls: M W S dines.

24. F. Commonwealth, revise. Brambletye, p. 214. M calls: call on
M W S
.
25. Sa. Commonwealth, 2 pages. Brambletye, p. 412, fin.

Feb. 26. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Booth ; adv. 3 Baxters
: T Ht at tea: M calls.
27. M. Commonwealth, revise. M W S calls. M J from Uxbridge . Letter to W .

28. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. Museum; Bowring & Strype; adv. Stavely
: M calls, twice.
Mar. 1. W. Commonwealth, revise.Write to W .

2. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Write to W . Call on M W S
: M sups.
3. F. Commonwealth, revise. W calls, liberated : M W S & fils dine; adv. W . W sleeps, 2 nights .
4. Sa. Commonwealth, revise.
Mar. 5. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Talk of Hillingdon . Two Baxters call.

6. M. Commonwealth, revise.
Museum; Rolle . L Hunt & M W S call: M W S dines.

7. Th. Commonwealth, revise.
Museum, Parl. History : dine at M W S’s , w.M J : La C Lamb’s, w. Burys, Bulwer, Benger, Spence, Wheeler, Fitzgerald, White, Russel .
8. W. Commonwealth, revise. W & M call: Hudson & White at tea.

9. Th. Commonwealth, revise. M W S & W dine: call on Black
: M au soir.

10. F. Commonwealth, revise.
Whitehall , w. W
. Call on Rodd ; adv. Henderson
: M W S calls.

11. Sa. Commonwealth, revise: End of Vol. II: read. Call on Reynolds
. End of Vol. II.

Mar. 12. Su. Commonwealth, read. M calls: call on
Hodgets
n .

13. M. Commonwealth, Vol. III, çala.Museum; Pennant . Write to Black . Call on M W S ; adv. mrs L Hunt
.

14. Tu. Commonwealth, Vol. II, 2 pp. Call on Isa. Booth
&
Fellowes
.

15. W. Commonwealth, çala (Oxford). Call on Booth
.

16. Th. Commonwealth, read. M W S dines; adv. W
: Concert, La C Lamb’s , w. Ponsonby & miss Spence . Coupe-doigt .invité L Hunt .

17. F. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Colburn
.

18. Sa.
Basinghall Street; Davison, Macmillan, Greenhill, Duncan & 3 Reads: M dines;adv. H M, Northcote & Booth
: H P at tea. Call on
R T
n .
Mar. 19. Su. Commonwealth, çala.

20. M. Commonwealth, Vol. III, 2 pages, & Advertisemt . Call on M W S
: Hodgets calls: Kenney sups. N G calls.

21. Tu. Commonwealth, 1/2 page. Call on Hume
n . Cold east wind, 7 days.
22. W. Laing, on Ossian, çala.

23. Th. Letter to W Lamb, 1 1/2 pages. M W S & W dine; invité L Hunt
. Snow.

24. F.
H P calls: N G at tea.Alfieri, p. 71.

25. Sa.
Mrs Wybolt calls: Basinghall Street; Macmillan, Greenhill, Duncan, Hume, R Taylor, Evans, 3 Reads, Macgowan, Lammin, Prince & mrs Ravenscroft : W dines; adv. M W S
: w. her, meet mrs Williams .

Mar. 26. Su. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pages. Call on M W S
: M au soir.

27. M. Commonwealth, 1 page. Mrs Raybolt calls:
theatre, 1/2 Tempest. M J for Rochester; 25 days.

28. Tu. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pages. Call on Hodgets
n .

29. W. Commonwealth, çala. Hume (Post-Office) calls: call, w.M W S, on Newton , adv. Russell, & Northcote
: M W Sdines; theatre, Rule a Wife, acts 1, 2, 3.
30. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Angerstein’s, w. W : M W S& W dine: theatre, Benyowsky, & 1/2 Oberon; w. M W S & son: adv. Kenney & sir R Phillips .
31. F. Commonwealth, 2 pages. Write to M J . Henderson & N G call.

Apr. 1. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Dine at Kenney’s , w. M W S, M Lamb & Poole; adv. Newton, Russel, Lamb & Ryle
.

Apr. 2. Su. Commonwealth, Vol. III, p. 3. Dine at Rowbotham’s , w. Hector, Saburra &Cameron junr ; adv. Deacon & Cameron senr
.

3. M. Commonwealth, p. 4. Dine at M W S’s , w. M; adv. mrs Williams
.
4. Tu. Indisposed. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Inglis (Pilgrimage of Soul): meet Hume, P O : Hodgets call n : theatre, 2/5 John Bull.

5. W. Commonwealth, p. 6. Call on Hume
n &
Mereweather
n : Poole calls n .

6. Th. Commonwealth, p. 7/2. Call on West, painter , w. M W S
: M W S dines; adv. W, N G & Kenney
.
7. F. Nervous. Letter from Lemon . Write to Peel & M J . Theatre, Good Natured Man.

8. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Poole
: Thornton, Lecture, Elizabeth.

Apr. 9. Su. Constip. Commonwealth, çala. Call on M W S
.

10. M. Commonwealth, p. 8/2. Dine at M W S’s , w. Kenney & W; adv. mrs Williams
. Commonwealth, Vol. II, 12 copies fr. Colburn .

11. T. Commonwealth, p. 8. State-Paper Office : Journal do
: M dines; adv. W : sup at Hodget’s , w. Dr & mrs Bevan .
12. W. Commonwealth, p. 9. Journal Office.

13. Th. Commonwealth, p. 12/2. Journal Office, frustra . Call on Rodd ; adv. Ollier
: M W S & W dine; adv. Poole & mrs Williams
.

14. F.
Pinguis . Commonwealth, çala. Call on Hume
: theatre, Oberon; adv. Newton
.

15. Sa. Indisposed. Commonwealth, çala. Dine at Hodgets junr
, w. senr , Bevans, Booth, Grundy & miss Hodgets . Write to M J .
Apr. 16. Su. Commonwealth, çala. M W S calls & dines : au soir, Lamb’s , w.M W S, mrs Reynolds & mrs Harwood .

17. M. Commonwealth, frustra . Wood on Homer, p. 78. Sup at
Reynolds’s
.

18. Tu. Fog. Wood, p. 133. Call on M W S
: theatre, Paul Pry.
19. W. Museum; Lilburne . Theatre, 3/10 Winter’s Tale.

20. Th. Museum; Lilburne . Call, w. M W S, on Northcote
n, & Angerstein’s : M W S & W dine. Meet Newton & Hardwick . Rhume.
21. F. Museum; Lilburne . M J from Rochester : M dines.
22. Sa. Commonwealth, 8 lines: study for character of Long Parliament.

Apr. 23. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Call on M W S ; adv. Isa
. Booth : W dines.
Vane & C.

24. M. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Rd Baxter
. Commonwealth, Vol. II, published .

25. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Stubbe; adv. Barnham
.
26. W. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Stubbe . call on M W S , w. M J . White & W at tea.
27. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Harrington . Theatre, 1/2 Wild Oats.

28. F. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Stubbe & Rogers . M W S, from Cartwright , calls: call on M W S ; adv. mrs W
.

29. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 19 (one page).
M calls: theatre, Mrs Wiggins . Mohicans, p. 73.

Apr. 30. Su. Commonwealth, p. 422/2. Mohicans, p. 155. Call on M W S
: W dines.
May 1. M. Commonwealth, p. 23. Museum; Lilburne . Mohicans, p. 287. Dine at M W S’s , w. M J & W . meet Kenney : Fellowes calls n .
2. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 24. Museum; Lilburne . Mohicans, Vol. II, p. 83. J F Newton calls n : theatre, Aladdin. see J F Newton .
3. W. Commonwealth, p. 26/2. Museum;Henry Denne . Mohicans, p. 210.

4. Th. Commonwealth, 1 page. Mohicans, p. 276. M W S dines; adv. W
. Call on Northcote
.
5. F. Commonwealth, p. 27. State-Paper Office. Mohicans, Vol. III, p. 92: Woodstock, p. 58.
6. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. State-Paper Office . Mohicans, p. 295, fin.
May 7. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Woodstock, p. 315.

8. M. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Burford . Woodstock, Vol. II, p. 118. Sup at Hodgets’ ; adv. Fitch,mrs Elison & miss Hodgets
. W dines.
Commonwealth, Vol. II, advertised, 16 s.

9. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 29. Museum; Burford . Woodstock, p. 332.Sup at Reynolds’s
. Write to Hume .

10. W. Commonwealth, p. 30. Woodstock, Vol. III, p. 68. Seek Fellowes : call on G Dyer
.

11. Th. Commonwealth, p. 32/2. Woodstock, p. 125. Exhibition; w. M W S : M W S dines; adv. W
: theatre, Henry IV; adv. mrs Bartley & Kenney
.
12. F. Commonwealth, çala. Woodstock, p. 294. Museum; Lilburne .

13. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 33. State Paper Office. Woodstock, p. 370. Call on Whittam
&
Bain
: meet J Taylor .

May 14. Su. Commonwealth, p. 35/2. Call on M W S
.
15. M. Commonwealth, p. 35. Journal Office, fr: meet Whittam : Hu[o?]ley & W sup.

16. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 38. Journal Office.
Theatre, for M W S & M W J; 1/3 Oberon .
17. W. Commonwealth, p. 41. Meet W at Journal Office . W sups.

18. Th. Commonwealth, p. 43. Write to Canning . State-Paper Office. M W S dines; adv. W,H P & mrs Williams
.
19. F. Commonwealth, çala. State-Paper Office. Kenneys call.

20. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Call on A Taylor
n & Booth : Rowbotham & P Nicholson call.

May 21. Su. Commonwealth, p. 45. Hodgets calls: call on M W S
: tea Kenney’s , w. King .
22. M. Commonwealth, p. 46. Museum: Lilburne . Theatre, Woodstock.

23. Tu. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp.
Theatre, 1/2 Aladdin, & Alexandre; adv. Skeffington & R Reynolds
.

24. W. Commonwealth, 5 lines. Museum; Lilburne . Notes on Hazlit
.

25. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Lilburne . M W S & W dine; adv. Uwins & Kenneys
.

26. F. Commonwealth, p. 49. Call on R T
: sup at Hodgets’ senr
, w. juniors & Kempson .
27. Sa. Commonwealth, çala.

May 28. Su. Commonwealth, p. 50. Letter from Canning . Call on M W S
: H P & W dine.

29. M. Commonwealth, p. 51. W from Journals . Theatre, Knights of the Cross; adv. Skeffington & Barham
.

30. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. N G at tea: sup at
Reynolds’s , w. S & O Boaden .
31. W. Commonwealth, p. 52. Theatre, Bon Ton. Parliament prorogued.

June 1. Th. Commonwealth, p. 54/2. Call on Northcote
: N G calls, & Jno junr
.
2. F. Commonwealth, p. 54. M W S & W dine. Parliament dissolved.
3. Sa. Woolston, Thundering Legion, pp. 112. Aug. Hippesley , & White n call.

June 4. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 246 to 280. Call on M W S
: meet B Montagu : sup at Lamb’s , w. Col. Philips & M Burney .

5. M. Indisposed. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 303. Hippesley calls: call on
Kenney
n &
T Rodd
. C M von Weber dies.
6. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Overton . Write to Mark Noble .

7. W. Rhume. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Overton : call on Uwins
: Uwins & L K call.

8. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Uwins , L K & Hippisley call: call on
Kenney
.
9. F. Commonwealth, çala. Kenney calls: W dines: Cobourg, Lear of Private Life.
10. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Bandello, p. 361.
June 11. Su. Commonwealth, çala. M W S & W dine. Northcote calls.

12. M. Commonwealth, p. 55. Call on La Cork
: T T calls: T T & W sup. Summer Heat, 5 days.

13. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 57. Museum; sir Rd Cox : N G calls: theatre, Somno, & Cup & Lip; adv. misses Bentley & Perry
.
14. W. Commonwealth, p. 59. Museum; Cox . Blondeville, Vol. I. T T calls: M W Sat tea.

15. Th. Commonwealth, p. 60/2. Museum; Cromwel . Write to B Montagu .
T T & W tea & supper; adv. T Ht
.

16. F. Commonwealth, p. 60. Museum; Cromwel . Dine at M W S’s
. Blondeville, Vol. II, p. 52. White calls n .
17. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Blondeville, p. 399.

June 18. Su. Commonwealth, p. 62. Bandello, p. 392. Call on M W S
: Uwins calls.

19. M. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Cromwel . Bandello, p. 411, fin. N G calls: sup at
Reynolds’s , w. Kenney .
20. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. State-Paper Office . Pecorone, p. 22. M W S at tea: Hippesley calls n .
21. W. Commonwealth, p. 63. State-Paper Office . St Albans Abbey, C. I: Pecorone, p. 48. Call on L K , twice.

22. Th.
Kenney & Henderson call. Letter from T T .

23, F. Commonwealth, p. 64. Write to T T . Dine & sleep at White’s, Isleworth
: water, down to Kew. born, Aug. 1750.)Taylor of Norwich dies .

24. Sa. Commonwealth, memorandum.Abbot, p. 72. Water, up to Twickenham, w. White, G White & Hillier; adv. Woodcock & François
.

June 25. Su. Commonwealth, p. 65. Call on Agar, Holly Terrace
: M W S & W dine. Hot weather, 17 days.

26. M. Commonwealth, p. 66. Call on Rodd
: N G calls.
27. Tu. Coach for Bognor, through Epsom, Dorking, Warnham & Arundel: visit to T T, who had been burned out the day before; seven nights .

28. W. Write to M J . Sense & Sensibility, p. 50 (Austen). Call on O’Keeffe
na .
29. Th. Livy, c. 6: Sense &, p. 160. Arundel Castle, w. Turners .

30. F. Livy, c. 12. Bersted Church: call on O’Keeffe
. Kelly, Reminiscences, Vol. I: Sense &, p. 160.
July 2. Su. Write to M J . Sense & Sensibility, p. 278; Vol. III, p. 107.

3. M. Write to M J . Sense & Sensibility, p. 301, fin. Call on O’Keeffe
.
4. Tu. Coach, through Little Hampton, Angwaring, Aslington, Horsham & Dorking: dine in Gower Place . Jefferson & Adams die .
5. W. Commonwealth, çala. M W S calls: W dines.
6. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Lilburne . Write to T T . Reynolds, Vol. II, p. 103.

7. F. Commonwealth, p. 67. Museum; Lilburne . Reynolds, p. 280. M W S & W dine; adv. Kenneys & T Ht
.

8. Sa. Commonwealth, 1 page. Reynolds, p. 422. Call on Kenney
n : sup at Reynolds’s
.

July 9. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Pecorone, p. 48 to 63. Call on Northcote
& Litchfield. H P calls, Pilchers in town .
10. M. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Lilburne . Pecorone, p. 105: Reynolds, Vol. I, p. 76. M W S & N G call.

11. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 68. Pecorone, p. 115: Reynolds, p. 171. Call on mrs & miss Pilcher
: meet L K & F Ht : theatre, 1/2 Broken Promises. Nervous.
12. W. Commonwealth, p. 69. Museum; Lilburne . Reynolds, p. 298. Kenneys at tea. meet J Bannister . Deliquia duo imperfecta .

13. Th.
Museum; Lilburne . Reynolds, p. 373, fin. W dines; adv. M W S
. Plura .

14. F. Hazlit, 2 pp. Chiverton, p. 100. M W S & Uwins call: call on
Lamb
n . Moriuntur .

15. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 70. Chiverton, p. 317, fin. Theatre, 1/2 Fortune’s Frolic, & Clari; adv. J Taylor
.

July 16. Su. Commonwealth, p. 71. M calls: call on
Northcote
: M W S & W at tea: Pecorone, p. 136.

17. M. Commonwealth, p. 72/2. Museum; Lilburne : call on R T
: meet J Taylor : N G calls: Hudson sups.

18. Tu. Nervous. Museum; Lilburne . Call on L K (adv. T Ht
) &
Uwins
n : Arnot (Calcutta) calls.
19. W. Commonwealth, p. 73/2. Museum; Lilburne . Lambs , Uwins & Taunton call. Child of Nature, Vol. I.

20. Th. Commonwealth, p. 75/2. Call on L K
: M W S, M & W dine; adv.N G & W Hopwood
. (Lilburne’s Trial.)

21. F. Nervous. Commonwealth, p. 75. L K & White call: call on
Booth
.

22. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Pecorone, p. 153. M W S, M &P P call: call on L K ; adv. T Ht
. Bien .
July 23. Su. Commonwealth, çala.

24. M. Commonwealth, 10 lines (Scotland.)
Aldis calls: N G at tea: sup at
Kenney , w. M J, W, T Ht & Powel .

25. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 77. Child of Nature, Vol. II. Theatre; Death-Fetch; adv. Barhams, Skeffington & Hill
.
26. W. Commonwealth, p. 78. M calls: M W S,P P & W dine: even Powel’s , w. Kenneys, mrs King, Dover & W .
27. Th. Commonwealth, 7 lines. Museum: Lothian . M calls: Lambs & W sup.
28. F. Commonwealth, p. 80, & 1 page. Pecorone, p. 164. Theatre, Thirteen to Dozen, & Village Lawyer.

29. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 81/2. M calls: sup at
Reynolds’s , w. Poole .

July 30. Su. Commonwealth, p. 82/2. Call on M W S ; adv. H Payne
.
31. M. Commonwealth, p. 83/2. Hudsons at tea. Thermometer, 81 ½ .

Aug. 1. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 85. Call on Macgowan
.

2. W. Commonwealth, p. 87/2. Dine at Aldis’s , w. Skeffington, Uwins, Blunt, Powys, Cooper{;} Woodham : theatre, Amateurs; adv. J Taylor & son, & Hardwick
. M W S calls, A M.

3. Th.
State-Paper Office . Pecorone, p. 204. M calls: M W S at tea. Gibson calls: meet Black .

4. F. Commonwealth, p. 88/2. Museum; adv. Anderson
: call on M W S
.

5. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 88. Call on Rodd
: H P calls.
Aug. 6. Su. Commonwealth, p. 89. Kenneys at tea.

7. M. Commonwealth, p. 91. Museum; Cooke : call on Rodd ; adv. Prowet
: theatre, 1/2 Oracle; adv. J Taylor
:
T T sups.
8. Tu. Commonwealth, 2 pp. Montaigne, çala. Anderson calls.
9. W. Commonwealth, 2 pp. Museum; Cooke . Call on Ollier ( Colburn ) .

10. Th. Commonwealth, çala (Agar & Blackstone). Seek Davison : theatre, 1/2 Oracle, & Lying Made Easy; adv.J Taylor
.

11. F. Commonwealth, çala. Seek Davison . Sup at Hodgets’
.

12. Sa. Commonwealth, çala (Davenant). Tea Kenney’s
. Write to M W S .

Aug. 13. Su. Commonwealth, 4 pp. Call on Northcote ; adv. Hawker, & King, painter
.
14. M. Commonwealth, 3 pp. Theatre, Actor of all Work, & Poor Relations.

15. Tu. Commonwealth, 1/2 page.
Museum; Eus. Andrews . Holcroft, Vol. I. Meet L Hunt .

16. W. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp. Write to Botwright . Call on Davison
: meet Reynolds . Holcroft, Vol. II.
17. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Holcroft, Vol. III. Sup at Kenneys , w. M J : Rodd calls n .

18. F. Commonwealth, p. 92. White calls: call on Rodd
n . Suetonius, J C, §. 7. Museum; Cook .
19. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 93/2. Suetonius, §. 15. Orphan.

Aug. 20. Su. Commonwealth, p. 95/2. Suetonius, §. 19. Hodgets au soir; adv. W
. Lady Sarah Napier dies, aged 82 .
21. M. Commonwealth, çala. Miss Trewen dines.
22. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 96. Museum; Neuville . Suetonius, §. 25. Hippisley calls: meet Lamb : Kenneys, T Ht & W sup.

23. W. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp. Museum; Neuville, &c . Meet Hippisley : call on F Reynolds, junr
.
24. Th. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp. Suetonius, §. 29. Museum; De Wit . Sup at Lamb’s , w. E Reynolds .
25. F. Commonwealth, p. 99/2. Museum; Chr. Love . Suetonius, §. 32
26. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 100. Isa Booth at tea.
